definition: to suspend or poise (especially in trade)

translations.bg: да се спре или да се уравновеси (особено в търговията)
translations.da: at suspendere eller balancere (især i handel)
translations.el: να αναστείλετε ή να ισορροπήσετε (ιδίως στο εμπόριο)
translations.es: suspender o apuntalar (especialmente en el comercio)
translations.fr: suspendre ou équilibrer (en particulier dans le commerce)
translations.hu: felfüggeszteni vagy egyensúlyban tartani (különösen a kereskedelemben)
translations.id: untuk menangguhkan atau menenangkan (terutama dalam perdagangan)
translations.it: sospendere o tenere in equilibrio (soprattutto nel commercio)
translations.nb: å suspendere eller balansere (spesielt i handel)
translations.nl: schorsen of stabiliseren (vooral in de handel)
translations.pt: suspender ou manter a posição (especialmente no comércio)
translations.ro: a suspenda sau a pune în echilibru (în special în comerț)
translations.sv: att hänga upp eller poisa (särskilt inom handel)
